content: this is a free crochet pattern 1 to make a cute and easy cauliflower **supplies ** 4mm crochet hook 4/medium weight yarn in white and green 8mm safety eyes tapestry needle scissors black embroidery thread and stuffing **additional information ** we start by making the cauliflower once making the cauliflower we make the leaves we then pin of the leaves and sew them onto he cauliflower finally we sew on the smile 1 https //stringydingding com/cauliflower-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/
